Text:
============-=H=-.-=E=-.-=L=-.-=P=-====
guys i use windows 7 ultimate 32bit intel core 2 quad but im using ASUS RADION EAH5570 and i have tried everything plz help me its something wrong with my computer? :(

I always had this blue screen and restart problem with this version, specially when playing media player 9x, one clip that I had would crash my system right away, I thought this was the problem with the media file that I was trying to play. But when I scanned using Avast after a elaborated google search with the blue screen error code I found several false positives (?) in this downloaded folder. I wonder is this false positive is actually a smart fraud perhaps.
Is anyone else having this problem?

*Install the "Media Player Classic" player for better visual and audio quality playback of all your videos. 
It's 100% free to download and use. Just updated January 31, 2011

*Media Player Classic Home Cinema*        
http://mpc-hc.sourceforge.net/
Went there and its been updated on July 22, 2011 :)
